<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Magic Hide](/Spells.aspx?ID=774)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 235 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** your animal companion
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your animal companion grows a thicker hide, matted fur, or a harder shell, granting it a +1 status bonus to AC.
